title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 261.2 - Role of time allowance committees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 261.2 - Role of time allowance committees

State Regulations

The purpose of the time allowance committee shall be to
make recommendations as to the amount of good behavior allowance to be granted
to inmates who are eligible to be considered for such
allowance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
261.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
